creator: GameXP.com
descriptionHtml:
«The Panic Room: House of Secrets» is an engaging hidden object game with a detective story, realistic graphics and captivating music. Enjoy the tantalizing air of mystery as you explore a Victorian mansion, complete thousands of intriguing quests, participate in exciting challenges and put together beautiful puzzles.

You wake up inside a locked mansion with many rooms and corridors, not knowing how you ended up here or why. As you begin to investigate, you learn that your mysterious abductor is a man who calls himself the Puppeteer, a madman that had imprisoned you and several other innocent people. But are things really what they seem?

You’ll have to explore every corner of the ancient house to get back your freedom. Talk to your neighbors, look for hidden items and complete challenges that will take you closer to your goal and reveal the secrets of the mansion’s reclusive inhabitants. After a while you will be offered to join the Resistance or become one of the Followers, but casting your lot with either side may eventually spell your doom.

What mystery does the old mansion hide? Search for the answers and fight for your freedom by putting together puzzles, completing challenges and solving quests in «The Panic Room: House of Secrets».

Features:

★ Mystic detective story that captivates you within minutes of play;
★ Realistic graphics and atmospheric ambient music;
★ Over 5000 plot quests, daily quests, event quests and more;
★ Collections, puzzles and riddles – the entire variety of hidden object pastimes;
★ Over nine game modes to master;
★ The ability to add friends, interact with them, help each other and make gifts;
★ Nonlinear plot: choose one of the branching story paths;
★ Twenty unique characters;
★ Over twenty different locations;
★ Four seasons in the ongoing story.

Game available on: Русский, English, Français, Deutsch, 日本語, Português, Español, Türkçe

Follow us:

Facebook – https://www.facebook.com/panicroomoutrage/
Game Wiki – https://www.gamexp.ru/wiki/panicroom/Main_Page
descriptionShort: Reveal the secrets of the old mansion: solve riddles and complete puzzles

But are things really what they seem?

You’ll have to explore every corner of the ancient house to get back your freedom. Talk to your neighbors, look for hidden items and complete challenges that will take you closer to your goal and reveal the secrets of the mansion’s reclusive inhabitants. After a while you will be offered to join the Resistance or become one of the Followers, but casting your lot with either side may eventually spell your doom.

What mystery does the old mansion hide? Search for the answers and fight for your freedom by putting together puzzles, completing challenges and solving quests in «The Panic Room: House of Secrets».

Enjoy the tantalizing air of mystery as you explore a Victorian mansion, complete thousands of intriguing quests, participate in exciting challenges and put together beautiful puzzles.

title: Panic Room | House of secrets

container.value: РОССИЯ, МОСКВА, УЛ. ВЕРЕЙСКАЯ, Д.29, СТР.33, 121357

creator: GameXP.com
descriptionHtml:
You wake up locked in an old mansion with many rooms and secret spaces, completely not understanding how and why you got here. Start your own detective investigation, and you will find out that your mysterious kidnapper is the owner of the house, nicknamed the Puppeteer, a mysterious madman who keeps several more innocent people imprisoned. But is this really the case?

To understand what is happening and gain freedom, you need to explore every corner of an old house: you have to communicate with neighbors, look for hidden objects and perform various quests that will not only bring you closer to salvation, but also reveal many secrets of the inhabitants of this place. The search will not be easy – there are a lot of locations and modes in the game. Soon the game will give you the most difficult moral choice: go Underground or join Followers, but do not rush to a decision, because it can be fatal.

What is the main secret of this mystical mansion? Find out the answers to all the questions and gain freedom by collecting puzzles and collections, and passing the most interesting quests in the "Panic room".

In the game you are expected:

★ A mystical detective story that captivates from the first minutes of passing;
★ Realistic graphics of game locations and music perfectly suited to the atmosphere;
★ More than 5000 quests: story, daily and event;
★ Collections, puzzles, puzzles – the whole set of hidden object entertainment;
★ Many different modes of passing locations to search for hidden objects;
★ The ability to find a friends - chat, help and send gifts;
★ Non-linear plot: choose one of the two opposite lines of a mystical and detective story;
★ It will be interesting for both adults and children;
★ The game and all its updates are absolutely free;
★ Every two weeks a new game event starts in the game in which you need to search and collect unique hidden objects;

You will definitely like this game:

★ If you like games in the genre of "hidden object", solve puzzles or collect puzzles
★ If detectives, detective games, investigations and mysteries excite your imagination
★ You speak and read in English

"Panic room: Hidden objects" is a free game for phones and tablets, which is constantly updated!

You wake up locked in an old mansion with many rooms and secret spaces, completely not understanding how and why you got here. Start your own detective investigation, and you will find out that your mysterious kidnapper is the owner of the house, nicknamed the Puppeteer, a mysterious madman who keeps several more innocent people imprisoned. But is this really the case?

To understand what is happening and gain freedom, you need to explore every corner of an old house: you have to communicate with neighbors, look for hidden objects and perform various quests that will not only bring you closer to salvation, but also reveal many secrets of the inhabitants of this place. The search will not be easy – there are a lot of locations and modes in the game. Soon the game will give you the most difficult moral choice: go Underground or join Followers, but do not rush to a decision, because it can be fatal.

What is the main secret of this mystical mansion? Find out the answers to all the questions and gain freedom by collecting puzzles and collections, and passing the most interesting quests in the "Panic room".

In the game you are expected:

★ A mystical detective story that captivates from the first minutes of passing;
★ Realistic graphics of game locations and music perfectly suited to the atmosphere;
★ More than 5000 quests: story, daily and event;
★ Collections, puzzles, puzzles – the whole set of hidden object entertainment;
★ Many different modes of passing locations to search for hidden objects;
★ The ability to find a friends - chat, help and send gifts;
★ Non-linear plot: choose one of the two opposite lines of a mystical and detective story;
★ It will be interesting for both adults and children;
★ The game and all its updates are absolutely free;
★ Every two weeks a new game event starts in the game in which you need to search and collect unique hidden objects;

You will definitely like this game:

★ If you like games in the genre of "hidden object", solve puzzles or collect puzzles
★ If detectives, detective games, investigations and mysteries excite your imagination
★ You speak and read in English

"Panic room: Hidden objects" is a free game for phones and tablets, which is constantly updated!
